title: Flat Layout Question
body: Can I see the floor plan for 3-Room flats?

title: Application Timeline
body: When will we know the results?
response: Results will be published within 3 weeks of application closing date.

title: Construction Completion
body: What is the expected completion date?

title: Test
body: How can I withdraw my application?
response: You can request withdrawal through the system and it will be reviewed.
